name: HSBC BANK USA, National Association, as Trustee for the Holders of Deutsche Alt-A Securities, Inc. v. Jeffrey NAVIN et al.
name_abbreviation: HSBC Bank United States, Nat'l Ass'n v. Navin

parties:
HSBC BANK USA, National Association, as Trustee for the Holders of Deutsche Alt-A Securities, Inc.
v.
Jeffrey NAVIN et al.
attorneys: The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38687) is dismissed.
casebody.head_matter:
HSBC BANK USA, National Association, as Trustee for the Holders of Deutsche Alt-A Securities, Inc.
v.
Jeffrey NAVIN et al.
Supreme Court of Connecticut.
Decided October 25, 2016
Kenneth R. Davis, in support of the petition.
The defendants' petition for certification for appeal from the Appellate Court (AC 38687) is dismissed.
